issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

fields.summary: Addresses are not released when instances are terminated

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
Steps to reproduce:
a) run three instances (not in one reservation)
b) set monitoring enabled for all the instances
c) set cloud.vmstate.instance_timeout to 1
d) stop eucalyptus-nc service on node controller
running all three instances and wait for the instances
to go into "terminated" state from CLC
(for 1 minute, it takes approx 5.30min)
e) start the NC back and wait for all the instances
to go into "running" state again
f) run another instance and wait for the
instance to go into running state
g) terminate all the instances

{noformat}
[root@b-11 ~]# euca-describe-instances
RESERVATION	r-08349d72	028100836801	default
INSTANCE	i-adc233de	emi-df73ef4f	10.111.100.0	172.27.218.57	running	sshlogin	0		m1.small	2014-05-28T18:43:28.776Z	PARTI00				monitoring-disabled	10.111.100.0	172.27.218.57			instance-store					hvm			sg-dc1a8531
TAG	instance	i-adc233de	euca:node	10.111.1.12
RESERVATION	r-3e5969d2	028100836801	default
INSTANCE	i-2b64a1cc	emi-df73ef4f	10.111.100.3	172.27.218.58	running	sshlogin	0		m1.small	2014-05-28T18:45:31.014Z	PARTI00				monitoring-disabled	10.111.100.3	172.27.218.58			instance-store					hvm			sg-dc1a8531
TAG	instance	i-2b64a1cc	euca:node	10.111.1.12
RESERVATION	r-a12f47d1	028100836801	default
INSTANCE	i-240152fe	emi-df73ef4f	10.111.100.1	172.27.218.60	running	sshlogin	0		m1.small	2014-05-28T18:43:29.013Z	PARTI00				monitoring-disabled	10.111.100.1	172.27.218.60			instance-store					hvm			sg-dc1a8531
TAG	instance	i-240152fe	euca:node	10.111.1.12
RESERVATION	r-6d076459	028100836801	default
INSTANCE	i-376de810	emi-df73ef4f	10.111.100.2	172.27.218.61	running	sshlogin	0		m1.small	2014-05-28T18:43:28.505Z	PARTI00				monitoring-disabled	10.111.100.2	172.27.218.61			instance-store					hvm			sg-dc1a8531
TAG	instance	i-376de810	euca:node	10.111.1.12

[root@b-11 ~]# euca-terminate-instances i-adc233de i-2b64a1cc i-240152fe i-376de810
INSTANCE	i-adc233de	running	shutting-down
INSTANCE	i-2b64a1cc	running	shutting-down
INSTANCE	i-240152fe	running	shutting-down
INSTANCE	i-376de810	running	shutting-down
[root@b-11 ~]#
[root@b-11 ~]# euca-terminate-instances i-adc233de i-2b64a1cc i-240152fe i-376de810
INSTANCE	i-adc233de	terminated	terminated
INSTANCE	i-2b64a1cc	terminated	terminated
INSTANCE	i-240152fe	terminated	terminated
INSTANCE	i-376de810	terminated	terminated
{noformat}

{noformat}

ADDRESS	10.111.100.1	i-adc233de (arn:aws:euare::000000000000:user/eucalyptus)	standard
ADDRESS	10.111.100.2	i-240152fe (arn:aws:euare::000000000000:user/eucalyptus)	standard
ADDRESS	10.111.100.3	nobody	standard
{noformat}

fields.summary: CLONE - for 4.1 - Addresses are not released when instances are terminated
